show_name: B Gata H Kei - Yamada’s First Time (TV)
other_title: Yamada's First Time - B Gata H Kei
plot: Yamada is a high school student, and a virgin, who aspires to have 100 casual sex partners. Despite this, she soon finds herself targeting and pursuing only one boy.
opening_theme: "Oshiete A to Z" (おしえて A to Z) by Yukari Tamura
ending_theme: "Hadashi no Princess" (裸足のプリンセス) by Yukari Tamura
